title: The Iron Gate
description: A rusted gate looms half-sunken in the collapsed wall. Wind pushes through the cracks, carrying the faint smell of ash and cold stone.

onEnter.log: You stand before the Iron Gate of the Sunken Citadel. Beyond it, the curse waits.

exits.log: With a grinding shriek, the gate yields and you step into the Citadel courtyard.
